features: ANTI-BLEMISH FACE WASH: Acne Deep Pore Cleansing Wash is a daily facial cleanser that removes built-up oil and debris to help unclog pores, promote clear skin and prevent future breakouts.

DEEP PORE CLEANSER: The active ingredient in this blemish control skin treatment is 2% Salicylic Acid, a tremendous skin exfoliator that helps prevent clogged pores that can cause spots and blemishes.

ALL NATURAL FORMULA: Packed full of powerful natural ingredients: Tea Tree Oil eases skin issues, rich Lavender Oil nurtures, Rosewood Oil balances, White Willow Bark Extract exfoliates, and Chamomile Flower Extract gently soothes sensitive skin.

DAILY SKIN CARE: For best results, apply the blemish control face wash 1-3 times daily. Apply a small amount of the facial cleanser to a wet face and neck. Work into a deep cleansing lather, rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

DERMA E: Clean beauty products that harness nature’s most effective ingredients. 100% vegan and cruelty-free, our eco-ethical skin care products contain no parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, petrolatum, lanolin, gluten, soy or GMOs, and are supplied in recyclable packaging.
body.description: Skin that is prone to breakouts requires a blemish control cleanser that strikes a fine balance. It needs to clear skin of the impurities that can cause spots, while at the same time nourishing the complexion without stripping it of the natural oils needed for a radiant appearance.This gentle pore cleansing face wash is an effective anti-blemish facial cleanser that can be used every day to rid skin of the dirt, bacteria, and excessive oil build-up that can clog pores and lead to breakouts, leaving you with beautifully clear-looking skin and a calm complexion.DERMA E's Acne Deep Pore Cleansing Wash can be used one to three times daily. Pour a small amount of facial cleanser onto dampened hands and apply to a wet face and neck. Work the face wash into a deep cleansing lather, concentrating on areas of congestion and oiliness. Cleanse the entire face and neck before rinsing thoroughly and patting dry.KEY BENEFITS- Deep cleansing face wash removes dirt, bacteria and built-up oil that may cause breakouts.- The blemish control cleanser gently cleans the skin to give it a healthy, balanced appearance.- 2% Salicylic Acid promotes exfoliation of dead skin cells to create a vibrant glow.CLEAN, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTSPacked full of skin-loving nutrients, the key ingredient in this Acne Deep Pore Cleanser is Salicylic Acid, which is a beta hydroxy acid that helps skin cells shed more easily. The power of Salicylic Acid is enhanced with our signature Anti-Blemish Complex, which is comprised of Tea Tree Oil, Willow Bark Extract, Lavender and Chamomile. This unique blend of plant-based ingredients doesn't just help unclog pores—it also soothes and balances skin for a remarkably clearer complexion.DERMA E Acne Deep Pore Cleansing Wash is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and does not contain parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, lanolin, gluten or GMOs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Ingredients: Tea Tree Willow Bark Rosewood Lavender Chamomile DERMA E Very Clear Acne Cleanser Benefits A daily cleanser that removes built-up oil and debris to help unclog pores, promote clear skin and prevent breakouts. Unclog pores Dry out blemishes Fight bacterial infection Reduce redness Calm and soothe inflamed or irritated skin

Anti-Blemish Very Clear Acne Cleanser Gently remove built-up oil and debris, help unclog pores and clarify skin while reducing redness and irritation with this daily cleanser. With an Anti-Blemish Complex of natural ingredients Tea Tree, Willow Bark, Rosewood, Lavender and Chamomile shown to be very effective on blemish-prone skin, this formula delivers natural antibacterial and antiseptic properties leaving skin purer, clearer and healthier. Regular use will help balance your complexion and your skin's own oil producing capabilities to help reduce the occurrence of breakouts. Will not leave a residue or irritate the skin. For best results use with DERMA E Very Clear Moisturizer, Very Clear Spot Treatment and Very Clear Scrub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cleanser I've tried yet
reviews.reviewText: This really is a great cleanser. After trying a multitude of drug store cleansers and never getting decent results (if any at all), I tried the natural route and was rewarded with much clearer skin. I used it in conjunction with Derma E's Vitamin A and Glycolic Toner.The texture and resulting lather of this cleanser took a while for me to get used to. My skin almost didn't feel clean after using it, but I became accustomed to it. (And really, I think that may have been one of my problems - I was stripping too much from my skin when washing.) The cleanser is really silky and doesn't really lather at all, but it glides over skin easily and the skin feels pretty silky after rinsing. It's also super gentle.After several uses, I noticed a big improvement in my skin quality. My skin was much smoother, plumper, less red, softer, and brighter. Appearance of pores was decreased. Blemishes/frequency of breakouts weren't noticeably improved right away.My skin was hardly breaking out at all after using this cleanser for a couple weeks. Before trying this, the pores on my cheeks had become very clogged and large and I constantly had several blemishes in that area. After several weeks of use, my cheeks were basically completely clear. The marks left by blemishes seemed to heal/disappear more quickly (keep in mind that I used the Vitamin A and Glycolic Toner as well - I think those two ingredients helped in the dark spot reduction area).I still did suffer the occasional blemish, so I decided to try a different natural cleanser but soon realized that I should switch back to the Derma E. The results after switching back were marked again; instant improvement in texture and calming of breakouts.After using this cleanser, I have realized that I have more sensitive skin than I thought; I believe that part of my problem with drug store cleansers is that salicylic acid is just too harsh and causes more problems than it solves. Give this cleanser a shot!
